title: Hanleys; or, Wheels within wheels
author: Caumont, Mary.
snippet: What for no ane o' the Farquharson girlies ? Their faither'sa weel-to-do sugar-refiner. Or auld Miss Jessie MacWhirteran' her sax hindert acres 'tither side Traprain Law ? Ih'ard tell Miss Jessie said she'd gie her hand an' heartto a minister o' the Free Kirk o' Scotland, or to naebody."
